original_title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
overview: Reclusive Hollywood legend, Evelyn Hugo, chooses an unknown reporter, Monique Grant, to tell her life story. Evelyn recounts her time in the Golden Age of Hollywood, her rise to fame, and her seven marriages â€” revealing stunning secrets and lies. But through it all, one question remains: Why has she chosen Monique for her final confession?
title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
